chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
I would like to withdraw from my purchase agreement in a timely manner. The device shows that there is liquid at the end and will no longer charge.
Thank you very much and best regards, Helene Krüger
Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €60 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Rejected! You know you're not allowed to do that! Please refund the full amount

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Seda Back Market customer Care

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Scratches

Dear Backcare,

As mentioned above, the device was purchased as an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €60 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
JH
